attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
being a thoroughly good egg & an upstanding taxpaying patriotic british citizen I believe I deserve an award more than some of the cricket team that spectacularly failed in the world cup.
lets face it they had a bye through to the final of the ashes series so they only had one team to beat
thank you

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
